sentences.sContent: The boss dropped an accountant from the payroll.
sentences.sCn: 老板把一名会计师从在职人员名单中除了名。

sentences.sContent: The accountant disputes the figures you gave him .
sentences.sCn: 会计师对你提供的数字提出质疑。

sentences.sContent: Do you want me to invite your accountant to this meeting?
sentences.sCn: 你想让我把你的会计师也邀请到会议里么？

phrases.pCn: 总会计师；会计主任，会计处长
注册会计师；会计师；特许会计师
注册会计师；审定会计师
初级会计师；助理会计员

words.tran: 会计工作；会计学；会计师之职

remMethod.val: account (账目) + ant (人) → 管账的人 → 会计， 会计师

trans.tranOther: someone whose job is to keep and check financial accounts, calculate taxes etc
